sentences.sContent: She carved a flower out of a radish.
sentences.sContent_eng: She carved a flower out of a radish.

sentences.sContent: There are many different kinds of kimchi - some made with cabbage, others made with cucumber or radish.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are many different kinds of kimchi - some made with cabbage, others made with cucumber or radish.
sentences.sCn: 泡菜有非常多不同的种类，一些是由白菜做成的，一些是由黄瓜或者萝卜做成的。

trans.tranOther: a small vegetable whose red or white root is eaten raw and has a strong spicy taste
